data.persona: As King it pains me to be the arbiter of who lives and dies. Sometimes the wrong person has to die for the right reason. Or the opposite.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a drape and a table here.
The architect and the servant are here.

You are carrying a cape, and wearing a jewelry, a robe, and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to take down the drape so it can be sent for repairs.
data.mid_motivation: I must get the drape so I can wrap it up and give it to servants to be packaged up for transport.
data.long_motivation: The drape that I took down will be sent off to be repaired in it's original country of origin and returned to the queen's room.
